1020380.name: Flatspace IIk Music Pack 3
1020380.description:
This is the third collection of 9 in-game music tracks to enhance Flatspace IIk. Like any in-game music for Flatspace, these will trigger at random when you enter a new sector.

The original Music Pack 3 for Flatspace II was released in 2013 and contained as selection of game music, and unreleased tracks. I also wanted to include some recent music, to reflect the sort of music I compose and perform now, and also evoke feelings of space at the end of time.

This pack includes a full description of the music as a pdf booklet. Here is an outline of the music included:

Adrift In Flat Space
An original track for this Music Pack, this track is a solo-piano improvisation that uses the main Flatspace theme as its source material.

Jellyfish
A fast race of notes from the my album of catchy game-like tunes, Bites of Greatness.

Paragon
Paragon is one of the final tracks from one of my earliest albums, Animalia. Inspired by Darwinian genetics, this is a unique edit made for this Music Pack.

Race The Sky
A supremely happy track which was originally included in the old Flatspace II Music Pack 3.

Requiem For A Million Skin Cells
Composed in 2017 for the album Cycles & Shadows, this brooding piano track originally began with a droned speech about the ageing process.

The Dying Of The Stars
A new track for this music pack, I wanted to include some music that had a naturalistic feeling, that could evoke the beauty and mystery of outer space.

Tiny Moon
A simple piece of music which was also present in the original Flatspace II Music Pack.

Waiting For The Rain To End
This track evokes the passing time in a dark month. The full track is present on the album The Twelve Seasons.
1020380.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
